markdown:
Summary : This image is a logo for a company or brand named "VCS" with the tagline "Value Care Solution". The design features the letters "VCS" and a series of red circular dots arranged in an arc. logo: VCS Value Care Solution # Text Elements : • Main text: "VCS" with "V" and "S" in black, "C" in red. • Tagline: "Value Care Solution" in red, italic font, positioned to the right of the "C". # Graphic Elements : • Red circular dots of varying sizes form an arc or semi-circle, starting below the text and curving above it. • Dots are shaded to give a three-dimensional effect. # Layout & Dimensions : • "VCS" is the central, largest text element. • "Value Care Solution" is smaller, aligned to the right and below the "C". • Dots begin below the "VCS" text and curve upward to the right, encircling the tagline. Analysis : • The logo uses red to convey energy and care, with the arc of dots suggesting connection, growth, or a dynamic solution. The combination of bold and italic fonts differentiates the main brand from the tagline, enhancing readability and emphasis. # Modtek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd. Office / Laboratory : E-405, S.G.M. Nagar, (Near Badkhal Lake) N.I.T. Faridabad-121001, (Haryana) E-mail : vaishnocalibration@yahoo.com, Mobile : 8527565501 Calibration Certificate Unique Lab Report No.: CC-388425000008034F Customer Name & Address: Prag Polymers A-40 & A-41, Talkatora Industrial Area, Lucknow-226011 Certificate Number: 25000008034 Issue Date of Certificate: 24 May 2025 Calibration Done At: Laboratory Date of Receipt of DUC: 15 May 2025 Date of Calibration: 15 May 2025 Next Due Date (as per customer request): 14 May 2026 logo: round black and white logo with Hindi and English text, featuring a star and ribbon, code CC-3884 Details of DUC: ID No.: GTM-13 Range: 0 to 110°C Condition at Receipt: No Damage Serial No.: - Least Count: 0.1°C Make/Model: Gera Research Location: Design Room Environmental Conditions:- Temperature (°C):- 24.6 Relative Humidity (%):- 43 Calibration Procedure References:- VCS/WI/56, IS 6274:1971 (Reaffirmed 2017) Standard Equipment Used For Calibration (Traceable to National/International Standards) Equipment Name: RTD (4 Wire) With Digital Thermometer Identification No.: VCS/RTD/01 & VCS/THM/01 Serial Number: - Calibration Certificate No.: 2401888 Calibration Date: 08 June 2024 Calibration Due Date: 07 June 2025 CALIBRATION RESULTS-THERMAL
Values of DUC (°C)Values of STD (°C)Error (°C)Expanded Uncertainty (±°C)
20.019.850.151.15
40.039.690.311.15
60.059.470.531.15
80.079.210.791.15
110.0109.050.951.15
Remarks: None
Abbreviations: STD-Standrad Equipment, DUC-Device Under Calibration Notes: 1. The reported expanded uncertainty is stated as the standard uncertainty in measurement multiplied by the coverage factor (k=2), which for a normal distribution corresponds a coverage probability of approximately 95%. 2. This certificate is referees only to the particular item submitted for calibration. 3. Results reported are valid at the time of and under stated conditions of measurement 4. This certificate shall not be reproduced except in full without permission of Head of Laboratory. 5. This certificate is for industrial and scientific purpose and can not be used in legal matters. Format No.-F/46, Rev.-01, Rev. Date-23/11/2020 Summary : This image shows an official stamp from "Nortek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd." with a handwritten signature and overlaid text indicating authorization by Vinit Sharma (Quality Manager). stamp: Shape & Border : • Circular stamp with a single-line border. • Blue ink. • Contains a small star at the bottom center inside the circle. Text Elements : • Outer ring: "NORTEK VAISHNO LABS PVT. LTD." • Inner ring: "FARIDABAD" (centered). • Overlaid printed text: "Vinit Sharma (Quality Manager) Authorized By". Graphic Elements : • Diagonal handwritten signature crossing through the stamp from lower left to upper right. Orientation & Placement : • Stamp is upright, signature runs diagonally. • Overlaid text is horizontally centered and partially overlaps the stamp. Analysis : • The stamp serves as an official mark of authorization for documents from Nortek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd., Faridabad. • The presence of both a signature and printed name/title indicates formal validation by the Quality Manager. Page 1 of 1 Summary : This is a logo for "Value Care Solution" featuring the acronym "VCS" and a series of red circular dots arranged in an arc. logo: Value Care Solution Main Elements : • Large acronym "VCS" with "V" and "S" in dark blue, "C" in red. • Tagline "Value Care Solution" in red italic font, positioned to the right of the "C". • Multiple red circular dots of varying sizes forming an arc around the text, starting from the lower left and curving to the upper right. Design Details : • Font: Serif style for "VCS", italic sans-serif for the tagline. • Colour palette: Dark blue and red for text, red for dots. • Dots: Nine red circles, largest near the "C", decreasing in size as they arc upward and right. • Layout: Central text with decorative arc of dots, balanced composition. Analysis : • The logo uses contrasting colours and a dynamic arc of dots to draw attention to the acronym and tagline, suggesting movement or connectivity. The red colour may convey energy or care, aligning with the company name. Modtek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd. Office / Laboratory : E-405, S.G.M. Nagar, (Near Badkhal Lake) N.I.T. Faridabad-121001, (Haryana) E-mail : vaishnocalibration@yahoo.com, Mobile : 8527565501 Summary : This image displays the title text "Calibration Certificate" in a stylized font, likely serving as a heading for a document related to instrument calibration. photo: Scene Overview : • Main subject is the phrase "Calibration Certificate" written in a bold, italicized, cursive font. • The text is centered horizontally on a plain white background. • No additional graphics, logos, or decorative elements are present. Technical Details : • Font style is cursive, bold, and italicized. • No scale bar, magnification, or other technical markings. • No visible document metadata or certificate details in this crop. Spatial Relationships : • The text occupies the central portion of the image. • No foreground or background elements other than the white backdrop. Analysis : • The image functions as a prominent heading, likely intended to introduce or authenticate a calibration certificate document. No further information about the certificate or its contents is visible in this crop. Format No.-F/46, Rev.-01, Rev. Date-23/11/2020 Summary : This is a blue-ink circular company stamp from "VIDTEK VAISHNO LABS PVT. LTD." with the location "FARIDABAD" in the center, overlaid by a diagonal signature. Below the stamp, the text "Vivek Sharma (Quality Manager) Authorized By" is partially visible. stamp: Shape & Border : • Circular stamp with a single-line border. • Blue ink. Text Elements : • Outer ring: "VIDTEK VAISHNO LABS PVT. LTD." • Center: "FARIDABAD" in uppercase. • Small five-pointed star at the bottom center inside the border. Signature : • Diagonal handwritten signature crossing the stamp from lower left to upper right. • Signature is in blue ink, matching the stamp. Placement & Dimensions : • Stamp is placed above the printed text "Vivek Sharma (Quality Manager) Authorized By". • Stamp diameter approximately matches the height of the text block below. Analysis : • The stamp and signature together indicate official authorization, likely for document validation or approval. • The presence of the quality manager's name and title reinforces the stamp's use for quality assurance or certification purposes. Page 1 of 1 Summary : This image is a logo for "Value Care Solution" (VCS), featuring the company acronym and tagline with a circular arrangement of red dots. logo: Value Care Solution (VCS) Main Elements : • Large acronym "VCS" in bold, with "V" and "S" in dark blue/black and "C" in red. • Tagline "Value Care Solution" in italicized red font, positioned below and to the right of the acronym. • Circular arc of red dots of varying sizes, starting from the lower left and curving above to the upper right, encircling the text. Design Details : • Colour palette: red (dots, "C", tagline), dark blue/black ("V", "S"). • Font: Bold sans-serif for "VCS", italic serif for tagline. • Dots: Seven larger dots and three smaller dots, forming a semi-circular arc. Spatial Arrangement : • "VCS" is centered, with the tagline aligned below and to the right. • Dots begin below the "C" and curve clockwise above the text, ending to the right. Analysis : • The logo uses red to highlight the "C" and the tagline, drawing attention to "Care" and "Solution". • The arc of dots suggests movement, connectivity, or a holistic approach, reinforcing the company's focus on value and care. • The design is clean and modern, with a clear emphasis on the acronym and brand identity. # Modtek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd." with a diagonal signature and overlaid text indicating authorization by Vinod Sharma (Quality Manager), located in Faridabad. stamp: Shape & Border : • Circular stamp with a single-line border. • Blue ink. • Small five-pointed star at the bottom center inside the border. Text Elements : • Outer ring text: "VAISHNO LABS PVT. LTD." (top half), "FARIDABAD" (center). • Inner ring text: "MODEL" (left side), "EK" (right side), forming "MODEL EK VAISHNO LABS PVT. LTD." • Overlaid printed text: "Vinod Sharma (Quality Manager) Authorized By". Graphic Elements : • Diagonal signature crossing the stamp from lower left to upper right. The design features the letters "VCS" prominently, with "Value Care Solution" written in a smaller, italicized font. Surrounding the text is a curved arrangement of red circles of varying sizes. logo: VCS Value Care Solution Main Elements : • Large, bold letters "VCS" with "V" and "S" in dark blue/black and "C" in red. • Tagline "Value Care Solution" in red, italicized font, positioned to the right of "VCS". • A curved arc of red circles, decreasing in size, encircling the text from the upper left to the lower right. Design & Placement : • The red circles form a semi-circular or spiral pattern, suggesting motion or connectivity. • The logo uses a white background for contrast. • The "C" in "VCS" is red, matching the circles and tagline, creating a unified color theme. Analysis : • The logo uses color contrast and circular motifs to draw attention to the brand initials and tagline. • The arc of circles may symbolize completeness, care, or a dynamic solution-oriented approach, aligning with the tagline "Value Care Solution". chunks.text:
Summary : This image is a logo for a company or brand named "VCS" with the tagline "Value Care Solution". The design features the letters "VCS" and a series of red circular dots arranged in an arc.

logo: VCS Value Care Solution

# Text Elements :
  • Main text: "VCS" with "V" and "S" in black, "C" in red.
  • Tagline: "Value Care Solution" in red, italic font, positioned to the right of the "C".

# Graphic Elements :
  • Red circular dots of varying sizes form an arc or semi-circle, starting below the text and curving above it.
  • Dots are shaded to give a three-dimensional effect.

# Layout & Dimensions :
  • "VCS" is the central, largest text element.
  • "Value Care Solution" is smaller, aligned to the right and below the "C".
  • Dots begin below the "VCS" text and curve upward to the right, encircling the tagline.

Analysis :
  • The logo uses red to convey energy and care, with the arc of dots suggesting connection, growth, or a dynamic solution. The combination of bold and italic fonts differentiates the main brand from the tagline, enhancing readability and emphasis.

# Modtek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd.
Office / Laboratory : E-405, S.G.M. Nagar, (Near Badkhal Lake) N.I.T. Faridabad-121001, (Haryana)
E-mail : vaishnocalibration@yahoo.com, Mobile : 8527565501
Calibration Certificate

Unique Lab Report No.: CC-388425000008034F

Customer Name & Address: Prag Polymers
A-40 & A-41, Talkatora Industrial Area,
Lucknow-226011

Certificate Number: 25000008034
Issue Date of Certificate: 24 May 2025
Calibration Done At: Laboratory

Date of Receipt of DUC: 15 May 2025
Date of Calibration: 15 May 2025
Next Due Date (as per customer request): 14 May 2026

logo: round black and white logo with Hindi and English text, featuring a star and ribbon, code CC-3884

ID No.: GTM-13
Range: 0 to 110°C
Condition at Receipt: No Damage

Serial No.: -
Least Count: 0.1°C

Make/Model: Gera Research
Location: Design Room

Environmental Conditions:-  Temperature (°C):- 24.6  Relative Humidity (%):- 43

Calibration Procedure References:- VCS/WI/56, IS 6274:1971 (Reaffirmed 2017)

Standard Equipment Used For Calibration (Traceable to National/International Standards)

Equipment Name: RTD (4 Wire) With Digital Thermometer
Identification No.: VCS/RTD/01 & VCS/THM/01
Serial Number: -
Calibration Certificate No.: 2401888

Notes: 1. The reported expanded uncertainty is stated as the standard uncertainty in measurement multiplied by the coverage factor (k=2), which for a normal distribution corresponds a coverage probability of approximately 95%.
2. This certificate is referees only to the particular item submitted for calibration.
3. Results reported are valid at the time of and under stated conditions of measurement
4. This certificate shall not be reproduced except in full without permission of Head of Laboratory.
5. This certificate is for industrial and scientific purpose and can not be used in legal matters.

stamp:
Shape & Border :
  • Circular stamp with a single-line border.
  • Blue ink.
  • Contains a small star at the bottom center inside the circle.

Text Elements :
  • Outer ring: "NORTEK VAISHNO LABS PVT. LTD."
  • Inner ring: "FARIDABAD" (centered).
  • Overlaid printed text: "Vinit Sharma (Quality Manager) Authorized By".

Graphic Elements :
  • Diagonal handwritten signature crossing through the stamp from lower left to upper right.

Orientation & Placement :
  • Stamp is upright, signature runs diagonally.
  • Overlaid text is horizontally centered and partially overlaps the stamp.

Analysis :
  • The stamp serves as an official mark of authorization for documents from Nortek Vaishno Labs Pvt. Ltd., Faridabad.
  • The presence of both a signature and printed name/title indicates formal validation by the Quality Manager.

  • Tagline "Value Care Solution" in red italic font, positioned to the right of the "C".
  • Multiple red circular dots of varying sizes forming an arc around the text, starting from the lower left and curving to the upper right.

Analysis :

Summary : This image is a logo for "Value Care Solution" (VCS), featuring the company acronym and tagline with a circular arrangement of red dots.

logo: Value Care Solution (VCS)

Main Elements :
  • Large acronym "VCS" in bold, with "V" and "S" in dark blue/black and "C" in red.
  • Tagline "Value Care Solution" in italicized red font, positioned below and to the right of the acronym.
  • Circular arc of red dots of varying sizes, starting from the lower left and curving above to the upper right, encircling the text.

Design Details :
  • Colour palette: red (dots, "C", tagline), dark blue/black ("V", "S").
  • Font: Bold sans-serif for "VCS", italic serif for tagline.
  • Dots: Seven larger dots and three smaller dots, forming a semi-circular arc.

Spatial Arrangement :
  • "VCS" is centered, with the tagline aligned below and to the right.
  • Dots begin below the "C" and curve clockwise above the text, ending to the right.

Analysis :
  • The logo uses red to highlight the "C" and the tagline, drawing attention to "Care" and "Solution".
  • The arc of dots suggests movement, connectivity, or a holistic approach, reinforcing the company's focus on value and care.
  • The design is clean and modern, with a clear emphasis on the acronym and brand identity.

Summary : This image is a logo for a company or brand named "VCS" with the tagline "Value Care Solution". The design features the letters "VCS" prominently, with "Value Care Solution" written in a smaller, italicized font. Surrounding the text is a curved arrangement of red circles of varying sizes.

logo: VCS Value Care Solution

Main Elements :
  • Large, bold letters "VCS" with "V" and "S" in dark blue/black and "C" in red.
  • Tagline "Value Care Solution" in red, italicized font, positioned to the right of "VCS".
  • A curved arc of red circles, decreasing in size, encircling the text from the upper left to the lower right.

Design & Placement :
  • The red circles form a semi-circular or spiral pattern, suggesting motion or connectivity.
  • The logo uses a white background for contrast.
  • The "C" in "VCS" is red, matching the circles and tagline, creating a unified color theme.

Analysis :
  • The logo uses color contrast and circular motifs to draw attention to the brand initials and tagline.
  • The arc of circles may symbolize completeness, care, or a dynamic solution-oriented approach, aligning with the tagline "Value Care Solution".
